Sometimes they get it right, and sometimes they do not, but they should never feel afraid to exist. 7/
I understand how every religion is made up of people, just people, coming together to do right by each other, and the rest of society. 6/
I have felt what it is like to be openly mocked for my religion and to have no one stand up for me. 5/
I have felt what it is like to have people be totally unaware of what my faith is and means to me. 4/
I have felt what it is like not to have my Holy days off school and work. 3/
I stand because I understand, as a Baha'i, what it's like to have a religion people don't understand nor do they care to understand. 2/
I stand with Muslims today, and always, not just because it is the morally correct thing to do. 1/
